application-template.name: Unique Profile Urls
application-template.description:
Make the unique urls in URLs file. Also it removes the public directory urls (like http://es.linkedin.com/pub/dir/Vadim/) from URLs
Author: Alexander Kozlov [alexssource@gmail.com]

property.description: Please, select the non-unique URLs file
property.label: [UniqueURLs] Input URLs filepath
property.name: inputFile
